content: Weâve also taken concrete steps to expand our partner strategy and open the platform to create new sources of indirect revenue and ensure our best-in-class customer engagement solutions are driving differentiated treated outcomes in the wider CX ecosystem, consistent with our previously announced profitable growth plan and the goal to further strengthen our P&L for the long-term, we are continuing to optimize our cost structure and purposefully trading some term lower quality revenue for stronger financial profile with sustainable, higher margin revenue in 2023 and beyond.
